title: Urgent Appeal Started
content: We have started this urgent appeal for our dear friend Panashe Muza who needs O-negative blood after a serious accident. Thank you to everyone who has already shared this message.
author: Support Team

title: First Donors Respond
content: We are grateful to report that 1 O-negative donor has donated. Every donation brings hope. Please continue sharing this message to reach more potential donors.
author: Support Team
